targets.query: SELECT "value" FROM "cpu/usage_rate" WHERE "namespace_name" = 'haystack-apps' AND "container_name" = 'trace-indexer' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "pod_name"
SELECT "value" FROM "cpu/usage_rate" WHERE "namespace_name" = 'haystack-apps' AND "container_name" = 'trace-indexer' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "pod_name"

panels.description:
If  eviction happens, 
it implies that stitch operation has not completed in memory. 
This may happen either due to increase in traffic or we are not running enough containers to stitch the incoming spans.
panels.title: In-Memory Store Cache Eviction

targets.query: SELECT "write.time.99thPercentile" FROM "haystack.traces.indexer" WHERE "class" = 'backend' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"
